pages.title: Music Sheets
pages.text: The Ocarina of Power can utilize music sheets. Music sheets add effects to your songs, activating those effects only after you've finished playing it.$(br2)Music sheets can be found all over your world, and can not be crafted.

pages.title: Music Sheet of Time
pages.text: While most music sheets buff the player, some can effect those around the player or the very nature of the world around them.$(br2)Mix and match your favorite music sheets to optimize your gameplay.
